experience.title: Engineer
experience.description: – Coordinated with multiple cross-functional teams and stakeholders to drive product deliverables and ensure smooth project outcomes across projects.– Dynamically created and presented comprehensive weekly status reports, adeptly tracking and validating crucial features, expertly creating and monitoring JIRAs for debugging and findings, and skillfully aligning stakeholders to facilitate optimized project progress.– Proficiently oversaw and streamlined scheduling of product timelines across more than seven high-performing teams, meticulously ensuring timely customer deliverables, uncompromising quality control, and thorough resolution of any debugging issues.– Proactively initiated systematic debugging and seamlessly aligned system metrics across all teams, enabling early detection and swift resolution of any issues, thus ensuring flawless project closure.– Collaborated closely with Customer Engineering teams, adeptly tracking and debugging customer-related issues, meticulously preparing the final Customer-Sample report, and confidently signing off on the project.– Innovatively automated validation of training and analysis of training data, significantly reducing manual effort and greatly accelerating project completion, resulting in an impressive and timely project outcome.
experience.description_html: – Coordinated with multiple cross-functional teams and stakeholders to drive product deliverables and ensure smooth project outcomes across projects.– Dynamically created and presented comprehensive weekly status reports, adeptly tracking and validating crucial features, expertly creating and monitoring JIRAs for debugging and findings, and skillfully aligning stakeholders to facilitate optimized project progress.– Proficiently oversaw and streamlined scheduling of product timelines across more than seven high-performing teams, meticulously ensuring timely customer deliverables, uncompromising quality control, and thorough resolution of any debugging issues.– Proactively initiated systematic debugging and seamlessly aligned system metrics across all teams, enabling early detection and swift resolution of any issues, thus ensuring flawless project closure.– Collaborated closely with Customer Engineering teams, adeptly tracking and debugging customer-related issues, meticulously preparing the final Customer-Sample report, and confidently signing off on the project.– Innovatively automated validation of training and analysis of training data, significantly reducing manual effort and greatly accelerating project completion, resulting in an impressive and timely project outcome.

recommendations: Ayush Dixit “There is no better colleague than Manisha. She is one of the most dedicated professionals I’ve worked with and is willing to put that extra help whenever you need it. She is a quick learner and a problem solver. Her contribution is valuable to the side, and I highly recommend Manisha and would love to work with her again.”
